text: Tumi ki dekhani ye, allaha akasa theke pani barsana karechena, atahpara se pani yaminera jharnasamuhe prabahita karechena, erapara taddbara bibhinna ranera phasala utpanna karena, atahpara ta sukiye yaya, phale tomara ta pitabarna dekhate pa'o. Erapara allaha take khara-kutaya parinata kare dena. Niscaya ete bud'dhimanadera jan'ye upadesa rayeche.
